remarks: Elementhood in the uniform structure generated by a metric ` D ` (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jan-2018.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
statement:
metuel2.u $e |- U = ( metUnif ` D ) $.
metuel2 $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( PsMet ` X ) ) -> ( V e. U <-> ( V C_ ( X X. X ) /\ E. d e. RR+ A. x e. X A. y e. X ( ( x D y ) < d -> x V y ) ) ) ) $.
$d D d x y $.
$d V d x y $.
$d X d x y $.
